channel.title: wsl on Pulse Code
channel.description: Recent content in wsl on Pulse Code

item.title: On The Bleeding Edge with WSL2
item.description: I've been a huge fan of WSL (Windows Subsystem for Linux) since it first came to Windows 10. In fact it's fair to say it has completely transformed how I do local development, run tools and my whole workflow. Naturally I was very interested in the news from Build announcing a new version of WSL, which seems to go by the rather functional (if descriptive) name “WSL2” I'm not going to get too deep into what's new and exciting with WSL2, as I think the announcement blog covers it nicely
